page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT IN BEDWORTH
page.content: The most popular entertainments in the area are social clubs,bingo halls & pubs.A major amenity provided by the Borough is{THE CIVIC HALL.}Opened to the public in 1973,the main hall seats 900 people & the smaller hall 100. There are 2 smaller meeting rooms & a youth hall.Rooms can be hired at costs ranging from Â£12 to Â£440. The different activities are: Boxing & wrestling(most popular-seats sell every time)concerts,variety shows & dances.There is also some ballet & opera(least popular-few seats sell). The Civic Hall takes an average of Â£331,000 a year from the sale of things like T shirts,tapes,records, tickets, programmes & alcoholic drinks.It costs Â£350,000 per year to run.The cost is covered by the rates (no more than 2p in the Â£ under the heading "Leisure & Amenities").
